cast.overview: During World War II, Steve Rogers is a sickly man from Brooklyn who's transformed into super-soldier Captain America to aid in the war effort. Rogers must stop the Red Skull – Adolf Hitler's ruthless head of weaponry, and the leader of an organization that intends to use a mysterious device of untold powers for world domination.
cast.title: Captain America: The First Avenger

cast.original_title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
cast.overview: Harry, Ron and Hermione walk away from their last year at Hogwarts to find and destroy the remaining Horcruxes, putting an end to Voldemort's bid for immortality. But with Harry's beloved Dumbledore dead and Voldemort's unscrupulous Death Eaters on the loose, the world is more dangerous than ever.
cast.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1

details.biography:
Nathan Robinson was born in the UK. He is an actor, known for Lucky Man (2016) Hamlet (2017) Christopher Wren Builds a Cathedral (2015)

Nat is an extra, stagehand, writer, creative person who loves TV, Film, Theatre and Radio. Nat loves to perform live comedy stand up and is awaiting that break in the industry.

Nat once trained to be a camera operator, he worked in a bingo hall and turned down a Bluecoat job, then joined several theatre companies.
details.name: Nathan Robinson
